name: monkey_mirror
description: Monkey Mirror IP or Hostname
label: Monkey Mirror IP or Hostname

name: driver_ip
description: Existing Driver IP
label: Existing Driver IP

name: num_compute_nodes
description: Number of New Compute Nodes
label: Number of HDP Compute nodes to create

name: excluded_services
description: Space-separated list of services to exclude from the new nodes
label: Space-separated list of services to exclude from the new nodes

name: vm_name_prefix
description: Prefix for vm names (preferably same as the existing cluster)
label: Prefix for VM Short Host name (preferably same as the existing cluster)

name: node_label
description: Node label for compute VMs (added to compose each new host name)
label: Node label for compute VMs (added to compose each new host name)

name: vm_dns_servers
description: DNS servers for the virtual network adapter
label: DNS Servers

name: vm_domain
description: Domain Name of Existing Cluster
label: Domain Name of Existing Cluster

name: vm-image
description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
label: Operating System ID / Template

name: vm_root_disk_size
description: Size of template disk volume. Should be equal to template's disk size
label: Root Disk Size

name: vm_root_disk_controller_type
description: Type of template disk controller
label: Template Disk Controller

name: vm_root_disk_datastore
description: Data store or storage cluster name for target virtual machine's disks
label: Template Disk Datastore

name: vm_root_disk_type
description: Type of template disk volume
label: Template Disk Type

name: vm_ipv4_gateway
description: IPv4 gateway for vNIC configuration
label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address

name: vm_start_ipv4_address
description: Start IPv4 address for vNIC configuration
label: Starting IP Address for VMs

name: vm_memory
description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
label: Virtual Machine Memory

name: vm_ipv4_prefix_length
description: IPv4 prefix length for vNIC configuration. The value must be a number between 8 and 32
label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix

name: vm_number_of_vcpu
description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
label: Virtual Machine vCPUs

name: vm_network_interface_label
description: vSphere port group or network label for virtual machine's vNIC
label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group

name: vm_datacenter
description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation
label: vSphere Datacenter

name: vm_adapter_type
description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
label: vSphere Network Adapter Type

name: vm_resource_pool
description: Target vSphere Resource Pool to host the virtual machine
label: vSphere Resource Pool

name: ssh_user
label: SSH User
description: The user for ssh connection, which is default in template

name: ssh_user_password
label: SSH User Password
description: The user password for ssh connection, which is default in template

name: public_ssh_key
description: Public SSH Key for Existing Cluster
label: Public SSH Key for Existing Cluster

name: private_ssh_key
description: Private SSH Key for Existing Cluster (must be base64 encoded WITHOUT newlines. Example: cat id_rsa|base64 -w 0)
label: Private SSH Key  for Existing Cluster (base64 encoded without newlines)

name: ssh_key_passphrase
description: SSH Key Passphrase for Existing Cluster
label: Private SSH Key Passphrase for Existing Cluster

name: cloud_install_tar_file_name
description: Name of the tar file downloaded from the mirror, which contains the Cloud Installer code.
label: Cloud Install tar file name

name: vm_datanode_disk_size
description: Size of data node data disks
label: Compute Node Data Disk Size
